Smart Air App – Conditions of use

Thank you for your interest in the Philips connected air purifier, (“Connected Product”) related application (“Smart Air App”)! This App is part of the Connected Product related services and is offered to you by Philips Consumer Lifestyle B.V. ("Philips"). In order to use the full functionality of the App, you will need to create an account and register with the help of the Smart Air App. The Smart Air App will guide you through this process automatically when required. When you only use the outdoor air quality and weather functionality of the Smart Air App, no registration is required.

In order to use the full functionality of the App, you will need to create an account and register with the help of the App. The App will guide you through this process automatically when required.

We welcome you to use this App for your personal entertainment, there are just a few rules and restrictions we ask you to keep in mind!


What this App does for you:

1. It allows you to manage certain aspects and functions of your Connected Product remotely

2. It allows transmission of certain information and notifications from and between your App and Connected Product to Philips and vice versa

3. Provide you with information on Philips connected air purifier products and accessories.

4. Provide you with your indoor air quality data and local cities’ AQI and weather data
